author: "Del Rio, Martin Antonio, 1551-1608"
title: "Disquisitionum magicarum libri sex. Quibus continetur accurata curiosarum artium, & vanarum superstitionum confutatio; utilis theologis, iuris consultis, medicis, philologis / auctore Martino Del Rio Societatis Jesu ... Prodit opus ultimis curis longe auc"
